remarks: Although it is defined for partial mappings of variables, every partial substitution is a substitution on some complete mapping of the variables.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mrsubvr.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
mrsubvr.r $e |- R = ( mREx ` T ) $.
mrsubvr.s $e |- S = ( mRSubst ` T ) $.
mrsubrn $p |- ran S = ( S " ( R ^m V ) ) $.
